ai-patthana17.31:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.31:0.3_0: for one who wraps over what has true,
ai-patthana17.31:1.1_0: One who has not given up the defilements, the Dhamma for the corruption of the defilements, or the corruption of the defilements.
ai-patthana17.31:2.1_0: One who has not defiled in this way is a cause of the defilements.
ai-patthana17.31:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana17.31:3.1_0: One who has not defilement and not defiled in this way is a cause of defilements and corruption gives rise to the defilements.
